item.title: Google style docstrings Examples
item.description: Python # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- """Example Google style docstrings. This module demonstrates documentation as specified by the `Google Python Style Guide`_. Docstrings may extend over multiple lines. Sections are created with a section header and a colon followed by a block of indented text. Example: Examples can be given using either the ``Example`` or ``Examples`` sections. Sections support any reStructuredText formatting, including literal blocks:: $ python example_google.py Section breaks are created by resuming unindented text.
